author: Jason E. Clapham
description: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.
name: Igloo
recipeIngredient: 5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)
1.25 ml Green crème de menthe green
5 ml Chilled water (omit if wet ice)

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass
